remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的泛型等效项。 The class is the generic equivalent of the class. 它通过使用大小根据需要动态增加的数组来实现泛型接口。It implements the generic interface by using an array whose size is dynamically increased as required. 您可以 使用或方法将项添加到中。You can add items to a by using the or methods. 类使用相等比较器和排序比较器。The class uses both an equality comparer and an ordering comparer. - 诸如、、和等方法对列表元素使用相等比较器。 Methods such as , , , and use an equality comparer for the list elements. 按如下方式确定类型`T`的默认相等比较器。The default equality comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果类型`T` 实现泛型接口, 则相等比较器是该接口的方法; 否则, 默认的相等比较器为。 If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the equality comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, the default equality comparer is . - 和等方法将排序比较器用于列表元素。Methods such as and use an ordering comparer for the list elements. 按如下方式确定类型`T`的默认比较器。The default comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果类型`T` `T` 实现泛型接口, 则默认比较器是该接口的方法; 否则, 如果类型实现非泛型接口, 则默认值为比较器是该接口的方法。If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, if type `T` implements the nongeneric interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface. 如果类型`T`同时实现两个接口, 则没有默认比较器, 必须显式提供一个比较器或比较委托。If type `T` implements neither interface, then there is no default comparer, and a comparer or comparison delegate must be provided explicitly. 不保证会对进行排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 必须先对进行排序, 然后再执行需要排序的操作 (如)。You must sort the before performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 此集合中的索引从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. **仅 .NET Framework:** 对于非常大的对象, 可以通过在运行时环境中`enabled`将[``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md)配置元素的属性设置为`true` , 来将64位系统上的最大容量增加到2000000000个元素。**.NET Framework only:** For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 接受`null`作为引用类型的有效值, 并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 有关类的不可变版本, 请参见。For an immutable version of the class, see . ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 在决定是使用还是类 (两者都具有类似的功能) 时, 请记住类在大多数情况下性能更佳并且是类型安全的。In deciding whether to use the or class, both of which have similar functionality, remember that the class performs better in most cases and is type safe. 如果引用类型用于`T` 类的类型, 则这两个类的行为是相同的。If a reference type is used for type `T` of the class, the behavior of the two classes is identical. 但是, 如果将值类型用于类型`T`, 则需要考虑实现和装箱问题。However, if a value type is used for type `T`, you need to consider implementation and boxing issues. 如果将值类型用于类型`T`, 则编译器将生成专用于该值类型的类的实现。If a value type is used for type `T`, the compiler generates an implementation of the class specifically for that value type. 这意味着, 在使用元素之前无需装箱对象的列表元素, 在创建了大约500个列表元素之后, 已保存的未装箱的内存列表元素大于用于生成类实现的内存。That means a list element of a object does not have to be boxed before the element can be used, and after about 500 list elements are created the memory saved not boxing list elements is greater than the memory used to generate the class implementation. 确定用于类型`T`的值类型实现泛型接口。Make certain the value type used for type `T` implements the generic interface. 如果不是, 则等方法必须调用方法, 这会对受影响的列表元素进行装箱。If not, methods such as must call the method, which boxes the affected list element. 如果值类型实现了接口, 并且你拥有源代码, 还需要实现泛型接口, 以防止和方法对列表元素进行装箱。If the value type implements the interface and you own the source code, also implement the generic interface to prevent the and methods from boxing list elements. 如果你不拥有源代码, 请将对象传递给和方法If you do not own the source code, pass an object to the and methods 您可以使用类的特定于类型的实现, 而不是使用类或自行编写强类型包装集合。It is to your advantage to use the type-specific implementation of the class instead of using the class or writing a strongly typed wrapper collection yourself. 原因在于, 你的实现必须执行 .NET Framework 的操作, 并且公共语言运行时可以共享你的实现不能的 Microsoft 中间语言代码和元数据。The reason is your implementation must do what the .NET Framework does for you already, and the common language runtime can share Microsoft intermediate language code and metadata, which your implementation cannot. ## F#放F# Considerations 类在代码中F#很少使用。 The class is used infrequently in F# code. 通常,[列表](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d)(这是不可变的单向链接列表) 通常是首选的。Instead, [Lists](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d), which are immutable, singly-linked lists, are typically preferred. F#列表提供了有序且不可变的值序列, 并支持在功能样式开发中使用。An F# List provides an ordered, immutable series of values, and is supported for use in functional-style development. 从F#使用时, 类通常由 collections.resizearray F# [\<不 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx)类型缩写词引用, 以避免与列表发生命名冲突。When used from F#, the class is typically referred to by the [ResizeArray\<'T>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx) type abbreviation to avoid naming conflicts with F# Lists ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在中添加、移除和插入简单的业务对象。The following example demonstrates how to add, remove, and insert a simple business object in a . (有关复杂类型的示例 , 请参见方法。)(For an example of a of complex types, see the method.) 无参数构造函数用于创建具有默认容量的字符串列表。The parameterless constructor is used to create a list of strings with the default capacity. 显示属性, 然后使用方法添加多个项。 The property is displayed and then the method is used to add several items. 将列出这些项, 并再次 显示属性和属性, 以显示容量已根据需要增加。The items are listed, and the property is displayed again, along with the property, to show that the capacity has been increased as needed. 方法用于测试列表中是否存在某一项, 此方法用于在列表的中间插入新项, 并再次显示该列表的内容。 The method is used to test for the presence of an item in the list, the method is used to insert a new item in the middle of the list, and the contents of the list are displayed again. 默认属性 (中C#的索引器) 用于检索项, 方法用于删除之前添加的重复项的第一个实例, 并再次显示内容。The default property (the indexer in C#) is used to retrieve an item, the method is used to remove the first instance of the duplicate item added earlier, and the contents are displayed again. 方法始终删除其遇到的第一个实例。The method always removes the first instance it encounters. 方法用于降低容量以匹配计数, 并显示和属性。 The method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量小于总容量的 10%, 则不会调整此列表的大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最后, 使用方法从列表中移除所有项, 并显示和属性。Finally, the method is used to remove all items from the list, and the and properties are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是可容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时, 将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可以估算, 使用构造函数并指定初始容量, 则无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, using the constructor and specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用方法或通过显式设置属性来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly. 减少容量会重新分配内存, 并复制中的所有元素。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 此构造函数的运算复杂度为 O (1)。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了泛型类的无参数构造函数。The following example demonstrates the parameterless constructor of the generic class. 无参数构造函数将创建一个具有默认容量的列表, 如显示属性所示。The parameterless constructor creates a list with the default capacity, as demonstrated by displaying the property. 该示例添加、插入和删除项, 显示了在使用这些方法时容量如何变化。The example adds, inserts, and removes items, showing how the capacity changes as these methods are used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按集合的枚举器读取元素的顺序将这些元素复制到中。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the collection. 此构造函数的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中*n*是中`collection`的元素数目。This constructor is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in `collection`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了对范围执行操作的类的构造函数和各种方法。The following example demonstrates the constructor and various methods of the class that act on ranges. 创建一个字符串数组, 并将其传递给构造函数, 并用数组的元素填充该列表。An array of strings is created and passed to the constructor, populating the list with the elements of the array. 然后显示该属性, 以显示初始容量完全是保留输入元素所需的容量。The property is then displayed, to show that the initial capacity is exactly what is required to hold the input elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是可容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时, 将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值, 则指定初始容量后, 无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用方法或通过显式设置属性来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly. 减少容量会重新分配内存, 并复制中的所有元素。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 此构造函数的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中`capacity` *n*是。This constructor is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `capacity`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了构造函数。The following example demonstrates the constructor. 创建了容量为4的字符串的, 因为已知列表的最终大小为4。A of strings with a capacity of 4 is created, because the ultimate size of the list is known to be exactly 4. 使用四个字符串填充列表, 并使用方法创建只读副本。The list is populated with four strings, and a read-only copy is created by using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中元素的顺序保留在中。The order of the elements in the collection is preserved in the . 如果新的 (当前加上集合的大小) 将大于, 则会自动重新分配内部数组以容纳新元素, 从而增加的容量,在添加新元素之前, 现有元素将被复制到新数组中。If the new (the current plus the size of the collection) will be greater than , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added. 如果在不增加的情况下可以容纳新元素, 则此方法为 O (*n*) 运算, 其中*n*是要添加的元素的数目。If the can accommodate the new elements without increasing the , this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素, 则此方法将成为 O (*n* + *m*) 运算, 其中*n*是要添加的元素的数目, *m*为。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new elements, this method becomes an O(*n* + *m*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added and *m* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了对范围执行操作的类的方法和其他方法。The following example demonstrates the method and various other methods of the class that act on ranges. 创建一个字符串数组, 并将其传递给构造函数, 并用数组的元素填充该列表。An array of strings is created and passed to the constructor, populating the list with the elements of the array. 调用方法, 并将列表作为其参数。The method is called, with the list as its argument. 结果是列表的当前元素将添加到列表的末尾, 从而复制所有元素。The result is that the current elements of the list are added to the end of the list, duplicating all the elements. summary.span: 返回当前集合的只读 包装器。

span.span: Returns a read-only wrapper for the current collection.

returns.span: 一个对象，作为围绕当前 的只读包装器。

span.span: An object that acts as a read-only wrapper around the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止对该对象进行任何修改, 只需要通过此包装器进行公开。To prevent any modifications to the object, expose it only through this wrapper. 对象不公开修改集合的方法。A object does not expose methods that modify the collection. 但是, 如果对基础对象进行了更改, 只读集合将反映这些更改。However, if changes are made to the underlying object, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法为 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 创建了容量为4的字符串的, 因为已知列表的最终大小为4。A of strings with a capacity of 4 is created, because the ultimate size of the list is known to be exactly 4. 列表中填充了四个字符串, 方法用于获取包装原始列表的只读泛型接口实现。The list is populated with four strings, and the method is used to get a read-only generic interface implementation that wraps the original list. 使用属性 (中C#的索引器) 将原始列表的元素设置为 "Coelophysis", 并再次显示只读列表的内容, 以表明它只是原始列表的包装。An element of the original list is set to "Coelophysis" using the property (the indexer in C#), and the contents of the read-only list are displayed again to demonstrate that it is just a wrapper for the original list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用类型 `T`的默认比较器来确定列表元素的顺序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 属性检查类型`T`是否实现泛型接口, 并使用该实现 (如果可用)。 The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 否则, 将检查类型`T`是否实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`未实现任何一个接口, 则会引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 必须已根据比较器实现进行排序; 否则, 结果不正确。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 使用泛型接口时, 允许与任何引用类型进行比较`null` , 并且不会生成异常。 Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 进行排序时`null` , 视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果包含多个具有相同值的元素, 则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项, 并且它可能会返回任何一个匹配项, 而不一定是第一个匹配项。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值, 则该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将按位求补运算 (~) 应用于此负整数, 以获取大于搜索值的第一个元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 将值插入到时, 应将此索引用作插入点来维护排序顺序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 此方法是 O (log *n*) 操作, 其中*n*是范围中元素的数目。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 将创建一个字符串, 并以无特定顺序填充四个字符串。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 将显示并排序列表, 并再次显示该列表。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 然后, 使用 方法重载搜索两个不在列表中的字符串,该方法用于插入它们。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 在每种情况下 , 方法的返回值为负, 因为字符串不在列表中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 采用按位求补 ( C#和视觉对象C++中的 ~ `Xor`运算符, Visual Basic 中的), 此负数将生成列表中大于搜索字符串的第一个元素的索引, 并在此位置插入保留排序顺序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二个搜索字符串大于列表中的任何元素, 因此插入位置在列表的末尾。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器自定义元素的比较方式。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如, 可以将实例用作比较器来执行不区分大小写的字符串搜索。For example, you can use a instance as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`提供了, 则使用指定的实现将的元素与指定的值进行比较。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer` 为`null`, 则默认比较器将检查`T`类型是否实现泛型接口, 并使用该实现 (如果可用)。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 否则, 将检查类型`T`是否实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`未实现任何一个接口, 则引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws . 必须已根据比较器实现进行排序; 否则, 结果不正确。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 使用泛型接口时, 允许与任何引用类型进行比较`null` , 并且不会生成异常。 Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 进行排序时`null` , 视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果包含多个具有相同值的元素, 则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项, 并且它可能会返回任何一个匹配项, 而不一定是第一个匹配项。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值, 则该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将按位求补运算 (~) 应用于此负整数, 以获取大于搜索值的第一个元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 将值插入到时, 应将此索引用作插入点来维护排序顺序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 此方法是 O (log *n*) 操作, 其中*n*是范围中元素的数目。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义了一个名为 DinoCompare 的字符串的替代比较器`IComparer` ,`IComparer(Of String)`该比较器`IComparer`实现了C++(在 Visual Basic 中的 Visual) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下:首先, 对这些比较的值`null`进行测试, 并将空引用视为小于非空引用。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次, 比较字符串长度, 较长的字符串被认为更大。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三, 如果长度相等, 则使用普通字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 将创建一个字符串, 并以无特定顺序填充四个字符串。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 随即显示列表, 使用替代比较器对其进行排序, 并再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 然后, 使用方法重载搜索多个不在列表中的字符串 (采用备用比较器)。 The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用于插入字符串。The method is used to insert the strings. 这两个方法`SearchAndInsert`都位于名为的函数中, 同时还包含用于采用按位求补的代码 (Visual Basic 和`Xor` C# C++中的 ~ 运算符), 并使用返回的负数作为用于插入新字符串的索引。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. summary.span: 获取或设置该内部数据结构在不调整大小的情况下能够容纳的元素总数。

span.span: Gets or sets the total number of elements the internal data structure can hold without resizing.

value.span: 在需要调整大小之前 能够容纳的元素的数目。

span.span: The number of elements that the can contain before resizing is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在需要调整大小之前可存储的元素数, 而是中实际的元素数。 is the number of elements that the can store before resizing is required, whereas is the number of elements that are actually in the . 始终大于或等于。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果在添加元素时超过, 则会在复制旧元素并添加新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组, 从而增加容量。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 如果容量大大大于计数, 并且你想要减少使用的内存, 则可以通过调用方法或将属性显式设置为较低值来减少容量。If the capacity is significantly larger than the count and you want to reduce the memory used by the , you can decrease capacity by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly to a lower value. 如果显式设置的值, 则还将重新分配内部数组以容纳指定的容量, 并复制所有元素。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity, and all the elements are copied. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O (1);设置属性的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中*n*是新容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the new capacity. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查包含简单业务对象的的容量和计数, 并说明如何使用方法来删除额外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素分别传递到委托, 并在找到匹配项时停止处理。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when a match is found. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了的和方法 , 其中包含实现的简单业务对象。The following example demonstrates the and methods on a that contains a simple business object that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了 使用泛型委托的方法和其他几种方法。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use the generic delegate. 创建一个字符串, 其中包含8个恐龙名称, 其中两个名称 (位置1和 5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义了一个名为`EndsWithSaurus`的搜索谓词方法, 该方法接受一个字符串参数, 并返回一个布尔值, 指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 、和方法用于在列表中搜索搜索谓词方法, 然后使用方法删除所有以 "saurus" 结尾的项。 The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method, and then the method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 最后, 调用方法。Finally, the method is called. 它从头开始遍历列表, 并将每个元素传递给`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 如果方法为任何元素返回`true` , 则搜索将停止, 并且方法将返回。 `true` `EndsWithSaurus`The search stops and the method returns `true` if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for any element. 方法 返回`false` , 因为已删除所有此类元素。The method returns `false` because all such elements have been removed. > [!NOTE] > 在C#和 Visual Basic 中, 无需显式创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. [!code-cpp[List\`1_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_FindEtAl/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_FindEtAl/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_FindEtAl/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素分别传递到委托, 并在中向前移动, 从第一个元素开始, 到最后一个元素结束。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving forward in the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 找到匹配项时将停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在搜索包含值类型的列表时, 请确保该类型的默认值不满足搜索谓词。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否则, 无法区分默认值, 指示找不到任何匹配项, 并且不能区分发生了该类型的默认值的列表元素。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 如果默认值满足搜索谓词, 请改用方法。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 以下示例演示包含简单上下文对象的 上的 方法。The following example demonstrates the method on a that contains a simple complex object. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了类的查找方法。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 类的示例包含`book`类`Book`的对象, 并使用[示例 XML 文件中的数据:图书 (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). 该`FillList`示例中的方法使用[LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)分析从 XML 到`book`对象的属性值的值。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表介绍了为 find 方法提供的示例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|示例Example| |------------|-------------| ||使用`IDToFind`谓词委托按 ID 查找书籍。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

C#示例使用匿名委托。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||使用谓词委托查找其`Genre`属性为"Computer"的所有书籍。`FindComputer`Find all books that whose `Genre` property is "Computer" using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`PubBefore2001`谓词委托查找集合中其发布日期早于2001的最后一本书。Finds the last book in the collection that has a publish date before 2001, using the `PubBefore2001` predicate delegate.

C#示例使用匿名委托。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找第一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找最后一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找集合的第二部分中第一台计算机书籍的索引。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找集合的后半部分中的最后一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前搜索从第一个元素开始, 到最后一个元素结束。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素被单独传递到委托。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委托具有签名:The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`Employee`一个具有两个`Name`字段和`Id`的类。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它还使用单个`EmployeeSearch` `StartsWith`方法定义一个类, 该方法指示`Employee.Name`字段是否以提供给`EmployeeSearch`类构造函数的指定子字符串开头。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 记下此方法的签名Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 对应于可传递给方法的委托签名。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 该示例实例化`List`一个对象, 向其中添加`Employee`多个对象, 然后调用该方法两次, 以便`Name`在第一个`Employee`对象的第一个对象开始时搜索整个集合对于 "J", 第一个`Employee` `Name`对象的第一个对象以 "Ju" 开头。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objects to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection, the first time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J", and the second time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format: ## Remarks `startIndex` `startIndex` `count`如果 大于0,则从开始向前搜索,并在plus减1处结束。`count`The is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素被单独传递到委托。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委托具有签名:The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n `count`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`Employee`一个具有两个`Name`字段和`Id`的类。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它还使用单个`EmployeeSearch` `StartsWith`方法定义一个类, 该方法指示`Employee.Name`字段是否以提供给`EmployeeSearch`类构造函数的指定子字符串开头。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 记下此方法的签名Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 对应于可传递给方法的委托签名。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 该示例实例化`List`一个对象, 向其中添加`Employee`多个对象, 然后调用该方法两次以搜索整个集合 (即从索引0到索引 -1 的成员)。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objects to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection (that is, the members from index 0 to index - 1). 第一次, `Employee`它会搜索其`Name`字段以 "J" 开头的第一个对象; 第二次搜索其`Name`字段以 " `Employee` Ju" 开头的第一个对象。The first time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J"; the second time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format:
## Remarks 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素分别传递到委托, 并在中向后移动, 从最后一个元素开始, 到第一个元素结束。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving backward in the , starting with the last element and ending with the first element. 找到匹配项时将停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在搜索包含值类型的列表时, 请确保该类型的默认值不满足搜索谓词。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否则, 无法区分默认值, 指示找不到任何匹配项, 并且不能区分发生了该类型的默认值的列表元素。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 如果默认值满足搜索谓词, 请改用方法。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类的查找方法。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 类的示例包含`book`类`Book`的对象, 并使用[示例 XML 文件中的数据:图书 (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). 该`FillList`示例中的方法使用[LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)分析从 XML 到`book`对象的属性值的值。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表介绍了为 find 方法提供的示例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|示例Example| |------------|-------------| ||使用`IDToFind`谓词委托按 ID 查找书籍。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

C#示例使用匿名委托。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找第一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找最后一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找集合的第二部分中第一台计算机书籍的索引。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||使用`FindComputer`谓词委托查找集合的后半部分中的最后一台计算机的索引。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks C#`for each`语句( C++在VisualBasic中)隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。`For Each` `foreach`The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置, 属性未定义。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此, 在读取的 值之前, 必须调用方法, 以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用之前 , 属性将返回相同的对象。The property returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾, 则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后, 并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时, 对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`, 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改 (如添加、修改或删除元素), 则枚举器将失效且不可恢复, 并且对或的下一个调用将引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用类型集合或集合子集的浅表副本只包含对集合中元素的引用。A shallow copy of a collection of reference types, or a subset of that collection, contains only the references to the elements of the collection. 对象本身不会被复制。The objects themselves are not copied. 新列表中的引用指向与原始列表中的引用相同的对象。The references in the new list point to the same objects as the references in the original list. 值类型集合 (或该集合的子集) 的浅层副本包含该集合的元素。A shallow copy of a collection of value types, or a subset of that collection, contains the elements of the collection. 但是, 如果集合的元素包含对其他对象的引用, 则不会复制这些对象。However, if the elements of the collection contain references to other objects, those objects are not copied. 新集合的元素中的引用指向与原始集合的元素中的引用相同的对象。The references in the elements of the new collection point to the same objects as the references in the elements of the original collection. 与此相反, 集合的深层副本会复制元素以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n `count`是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了对范围执行操作的类的方法和其他方法。The following example demonstrates the method and other methods of the class that act on ranges. 在示例结束时, 方法用于从列表中获取三个项, 从索引位置2开始。At the end of the example, the method is used to get three items from the list, beginning with index location 2. 对生成的方法调用方法, 创建一个包含三个元素的数组。 The method is called on the resulting , creating an array of three elements. 显示数组的元素。The elements of the array are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前搜索从第一个元素开始, 到最后一个元素结束。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 此方法使用的默认相等比较器 `T`(列表中的值的类型) 确定相等性。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的所有三个重载。The following example demonstrates all three overloads of the method. 将创建一个字符串, 其中一个条目出现两次, 位于索引位置0和索引位置5。A of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从开始处搜索列表, 并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload searches the list from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于搜索索引位置3开头的列表并继续到列表末尾, 并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the list beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the list, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 最后, 使用方法重载搜索两个条目的范围 (从第二个索引位置开始); 它返回-1, 因为该范围中没有搜索字符串的实例。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`作为引用类型的有效值, 并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O (1);设置属性也是 O (1) 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 本节中的示例演示了 泛型类的属性 (中C#的索引器) 以及各种其他属性和方法。The example in this section demonstrates the property (the indexer in C#) and various other properties and methods of the generic class. 使用方法创建并填充列表后, 将使用属性检索和显示元素。After the list has been created and populated using the method, an element is retrieved and displayed using the property. (有关使用属性设置列表元素值的示例, 请参见。)(For an example that uses the property to set the value of a list element, see .) > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic、 C#和C++都具有用于访问属性的语法, 而不使用其名称。Visual Basic, C#, and C++ all have syntax for accessing the property without using its name. 相反, 包含的变量将用作数组。Instead, the variable containing the is used as if it were an array. 该C#语言使用[`this`](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)关键字来定义索引器, 而不是实现属性。The C# language uses the [`this`](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向后搜索从最后一个元素开始, 到第一个元素结束。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 此方法使用的默认相等比较器 `T`(列表中的值的类型) 确定相等性。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的所有三个重载。The following example demonstrates all three overloads of the method. 将创建一个字符串, 其中一个条目出现两次, 位于索引位置0和索引位置5。A of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从末尾搜索整个列表, 并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire list from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于在列表中从索引位置3开始向后搜索, 并延续到列表的开头, 以便在列表中找到该字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the list backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the list, so it finds the first occurrence of the string in the list. 最后, 方法重载用于搜索由四个条目组成的范围, 从索引位置4开始并向后扩展 (也就是说, 它会搜索位于4、3、2和1位置的项); 此搜索将返回-1, 因为没有搜索实例此范围内的字符串。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 将当前的元素分别传递到委托, 并从中删除与条件相匹配的元素。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and the elements that match the conditions are removed from the . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此, 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 使用泛型委托的方法和其他几种方法。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use the generic delegate. 创建一个字符串, 其中包含8个恐龙名称, 其中两个名称 (位置1和 5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义了一个名为`EndsWithSaurus`的搜索谓词方法, 该方法接受一个字符串参数, 并返回一个布尔值, 指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 、和方法用于使用搜索谓词方法搜索列表。 The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method. 方法用于删除以 "saurus" 结尾的所有条目。The method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 它从头开始遍历列表, 并将每个元素传递给`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 如果该`EndsWithSaurus`方法返回`true`, 则移除该元素。The element is removed if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在C#和 Visual Basic 中, 无需显式创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推导出正确的委托, 并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context, and create it automatically. 最后, 方法验证列表中是否不存在以 "saurus" 结尾的字符串。Finally, the method verifies that there are no strings in the list that end with "saurus". span.span: Sorts the elements in the entire using the default comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用类型 `T`的默认比较器来确定列表元素的顺序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 属性检查类型`T`是否实现泛型接口, 并使用该实现 (如果可用)。 The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 否则, 将检查类型`T`是否实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`未实现任何一个接口, 则会引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用方法, 该方法应用反省排序, 如下所示:This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于16个, 则使用插入排序算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果分区数超过2个 log *n*, 其中*n*是输入数组的范围, 则使用 Heapsort 算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否则, 它将使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现执行不稳定的排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素相等, 则可能不会保留它们的顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相反, 稳定排序会保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 平均而言, 此方法为 o (*n* log *n*) 操作, 其中*n* 为; 在最坏情况下, 它是一个 o (*n*2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例向`List`对象添加一些名称, 以未排序的顺序显示列表, 调用方法, 然后显示已排序的列表。The following example adds some names to a `List` object, displays the list in unsorted order, calls the method, and then displays the sorted list. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/Sort1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/Sort1.vb#2)] 下面的代码演示简单业务对象上的和方法重载。The following code demonstrates the and method overloads on a simple business object. 调用方法会导致为部件类型使用默认比较器, 并使用匿名方法实现方法。 Calling the method results in the use of the default comparer for the Part type, and the method is implemented by using an anonymous method. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 将创建一个字符串, 并以无特定顺序填充四个字符串。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 将显示并排序列表, 并再次显示该列表。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 然后, 使用 方法重载搜索两个不在列表中的字符串,该方法用于插入它们。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 在每种情况下 , 方法的返回值为负, 因为字符串不在列表中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 采用按位求补 ( C#和视觉对象C++中的 ~ `Xor`运算符, Visual Basic 中的), 此负数将生成列表中大于搜索字符串的第一个元素的索引, 并在此位置插入保留排序顺序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二个搜索字符串大于列表中的任何元素, 因此插入位置在列表的末尾。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`提供了, 则使用指定的实现对的元素进行排序。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are sorted using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer` 为`null`, 则默认比较器将检查`T`类型是否实现泛型接口, 并使用该实现 (如果可用)。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 否则, 将检查类型`T`是否实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`未实现任何一个接口, 则会引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用方法, 该方法应用反省排序, 如下所示:This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于16个, 则使用插入排序算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果分区数超过2个 log *n*, 其中*n*是输入数组的范围, 则使用 Heapsort 算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否则, 它将使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现执行不稳定的排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素相等, 则可能不会保留它们的顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相反, 稳定排序会保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 平均而言, 此方法为 o (*n* log *n*) 操作, 其中*n* 为; 在最坏情况下, 它是一个 o (*n*2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义了一个名为 DinoCompare 的字符串的替代比较器`IComparer` ,`IComparer(Of String)`该比较器`IComparer`实现了C++(在 Visual Basic 中的 Visual) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下:首先, 对这些比较的值`null`进行测试, 并将空引用视为小于非空引用。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次, 比较字符串长度, 较长的字符串被认为更大。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三, 如果长度相等, 则使用普通字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 将创建一个字符串, 并以无特定顺序填充四个字符串。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 随即显示列表, 使用替代比较器对其进行排序, 并再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 然后, 使用方法重载搜索多个不在列表中的字符串 (采用备用比较器)。 The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用于插入字符串。The method is used to insert the strings. 这两个方法`SearchAndInsert`都位于名为的函数中, 同时还包含用于采用按位求补的代码 (Visual Basic 和`Xor` C# C++中的 ~ 运算符), 并使用返回的负数作为用于插入新字符串的索引。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`提供了, 则使用指定的实现对的元素进行排序。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are sorted using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer` 为`null`, 则默认比较器将检查`T`类型是否实现泛型接口, 并使用该实现 (如果可用)。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 否则, 将检查类型`T`是否实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`未实现任何一个接口, 则会引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用, 它将应用反省排序, 如下所示:This method uses , which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于16个元素, 则使用插入排序算法If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm - 如果分区数超过2个 log *n*, 其中*n*是输入数组的范围, 则使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则, 它将使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现执行不稳定的排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素相等, 则可能不会保留它们的顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相反, 稳定排序会保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 平均而言, 此方法为 o (*n* log *n*) 操作, 其中*n* 为; 在最坏情况下, 它是一个 o (*n*2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义了一个名为 DinoCompare 的字符串的替代比较器`IComparer` ,`IComparer(Of String)`该比较器`IComparer`实现了C++(在 Visual Basic 中的 Visual) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下:首先, 对这些比较的值`null`进行测试, 并将空引用视为小于非空引用。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次, 比较字符串长度, 较长的字符串被认为更大。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三, 如果长度相等, 则使用普通字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 创建一个字符串, 并使用5个 herbivorous 恐龙和3个 carnivorous 恐龙的名称填充。A of strings is created and populated with the names of five herbivorous dinosaurs and three carnivorous dinosaurs. 这两个组中的每个组的名称不是任何特定的排序顺序。Within each of the two groups, the names are not in any particular sort order. 随即显示列表, 使用替代比较器对 herbivores 的范围进行排序, 并再次显示该列表。The list is displayed, the range of herbivores is sorted using the alternate comparer, and the list is displayed again. 然后 , 使用方法重载仅搜索 "Brachiosaurus" 的 herbivores 范围。The method overload is then used to search only the range of herbivores for "Brachiosaurus". 找不到该字符串, C#并将该C++ `Xor` 方法返回的负数的按位求补 (在和视觉对象中为 ~ Visual Basic) 用作插入新字符串的索引。The string is not found, and the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by the method is used as an index for inserting the new string. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合, 其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此, 如果对基础集合进行了更改, 只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C#`for each`语句( C++在VisualBasic中)隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。`For Each` `foreach`The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置, 属性未定义。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此, 在读取的 值之前, 必须调用方法, 以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用之前 , 属性将返回相同的对象。The property returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾, 则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后, 并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时, 对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`, 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改 (如添加、修改或删除元素), 则枚举器将失效且不可恢复, 并且对或的下一个调用将引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 在具有写入访问的枚举竞争的罕见情况下, 可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。In the rare case where enumeration contends with write accesses, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象, 该对象可用于同步对的访问。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 仅当所有线程在访问集合之前锁定此对象时, 同步才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合, 其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此, 如果对基础集合进行了更改, 包括添加或删除元素, 则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有新元素添加到集合中, 则可以使用此方法最大程度地减少集合的内存开销。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 但重新分配和复制较大的成本可能很大, 因此, 如果列表的容量超过 90%, 此方法不会执行任何操作。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 这样可以避免因相对较小的收益而产生较大的重新分配成本。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. > [!NOTE] > 在未来的版本中, 当前阈值 90% 可能会更改。The current threshold of 90 percent might change in future releases. 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 若要将重置为其初始状态, 请在调用方法之前调用方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling the method. 修整空会将的容量设置为默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 还可以使用属性设置容量。The capacity can also be set using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查包含简单业务对象的的容量和计数, 并说明如何使用方法来删除额外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 类的多个属性和方法用于在字符串列表中添加、插入和移除项。Several properties and methods of the class are used to add, insert, and remove items from a list of strings. 然后, 使用 方法来减小容量以匹配计数, 并显示和属性。 Then the method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量小于总容量的 10%, 则不会调整此列表的大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最后, 清除列表的内容。Finally, the contents of the list are cleared. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个方法委托, 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配, 则它将返回`true`。 The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前的元素被单独传递到委托, 当委托为任何元素返回`false`时, 将停止处理。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when the delegate returns `false` for any element. 元素按顺序进行处理, 所有调用都在单个线程上进行。The elements are processed in order, and all calls are made on a single thread. 此方法的运算复杂度为 O (*n*), 其中 n 是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用泛型委托的方法和其他几种方法。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use generic delegate. 创建一个字符串, 其中包含8个恐龙名称, 其中两个名称 (位置1和 5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义了一个名为`EndsWithSaurus`的搜索谓词方法, 该方法接受一个字符串参数, 并返回一个布尔值, 指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法从头开始遍历列表, 并将中的`EndsWithSaurus`每个元素传递给方法。 The method traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 此`EndsWithSaurus`方法返回`false`时将停止搜索。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 在C#和 Visual Basic 中, 无需显式创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
